channel.title: Comments on: $13k
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: Gary Gygax assembled the first D&D boxed sets himself, apparently. So you'd be in good company.At $13 you wouldn't have to charge all that much to make a decent profit. Board game companies must have a huge markup!
item.content:encoded: Gary Gygax assembled the first D&D boxed sets himself, apparently. So you’d be in good company.At $13 you wouldn’t have to charge all that much to make a decent profit. Board game companies must have a huge markup!
